[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create curricula for various[0m
[33mprofessional audiences. [0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you map out the audience for a given curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mEXAMPLE: Customer Success curriculum[0m
[1;33m1[0m[33m. Early career people considering a Customer Success career path.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. People currently in customer service roles and who are looking to leverage their skills to move into [0m
[33mmore specialized customer success positions.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. People in adjacent roles who want/need to embrace a service mindset[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Javascript curriculum[0m
[33mBeginning web developers or programmers without experience in Javascript[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Docker curriculum[0m
[33mSofware developers and DevOps Engineers[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: DevOps curriculum[0m
[33mDevOps Engineers, and developer [0m[33m/[0m[33m IT needing a basic understanding of DevOps practices[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Microservices curriculum[0m
[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[1;32m───────────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ─────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m# Agile Project Management Curriculum Audience[0m

[34mThis curriculum targets three key groups:[0m

[1;34m1[0m[34m. Project managers transitioning from traditional to agile methodologies who need practical implementation[0m
[34mskills.[0m

[1;34m2[0m[34m. Team members new to agile practices seeking to understand the mindset, principles, and common frameworks[0m
[1;34m([0m[34mespecially Scrum[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m.[0m

[1;34m3[0m[34m. Professionals in any role looking to effectively use Jira Cloud for agile project management, from basic[0m
[34msetup through advanced features.[0m

[34mThe content assumes minimal prior agile knowledge while providing sufficient depth for practical [0m
[34mapplication in real work environments.[0m

[1;32m───────────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ─────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36muser:[0m
[33mYou are an L&D administrator at a large enterprise organization, and regularly create training programs for[0m
[33mvarious professional audiences.[0m

[33mHere are some examples of how you create descriptions of your learning programs:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mNursing professionals are expected to have both clinical and business skills to succeed in management [0m
[33mroles. This learning path teaches the skills needed to excel in healthcare management: business basics, [0m
[33mproject management, financial literacy, and how to use AI tools to enhance productivity. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mWant to learn what microservices are all about? This architecture pattern helps developers work faster and [0m
[33mbuild more resilient systems. These courses cover everything from beginner foundations to advanced patterns[0m
[33mand refactoring codebases. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mDevOps is not a framework or a workflow. DevOps ensures collaboration and communication between software [0m
[33mengineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to review the [0m
[33mfundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by mastering the[0m
[33mfundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, efficient code. By the end,[0m
[33myou'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs and applications. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. Software [0m
[33mdevelopers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether you are new to [0m
[33mDocker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and [0m
[33mearn your certificate.[0m

[33mJavaScript is the key to a career in front-end development. These courses equip you with essential skills [0m
[33mto master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions to advanced topics such as [0m
[33masynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and real-time feedback, you'll gain the [0m
[33mexpertise needed to excel in web development. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mYour team is going to publish a certtificate program titled:[0m
[33mAtlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mNow look at this list of course titles and descriptions for a curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Agile Foundations**: Learn the foundational concepts you need to know to start thinking like an agile [0m
[33mteam.[0m
[33m**Scrum: The Basics**: Learn what scrum is and how you can start implementing it in your project management[0m
[33mworkflow.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m Projects, Boards, and Issues**: Get an overview of agile [0m
[33mmethodology and Jira, and learn how to use project boards, make logged issues more useful, and leverage the[0m
[33mkanban method.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m Lean and Agile Processes**: Learn about lean and agile [0m
[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m
[33m**Agile Project Management with Jira Cloud: [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m Advanced Topics**: Learn how to use filters, identify and [0m
[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mThe length of your answer should be between [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m and [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m words.[0m

[1;32m───────────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ─────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mAgile project management is revolutionizing how teams deliver value. This certificate program teaches you [0m
[34mAtlassian's approach to agile methodology using Jira Cloud, covering everything from foundational concepts [0m
[34mto advanced implementation techniques. You'll learn scrum principles, kanban methods, and practical [0m
[34mstrategies to avoid common agile pitfalls. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mshould start with one of these verbs:[0m

[33mPlan Analyze Identify Practice Create Discover Compare Explore Describe Research[0m

[33mthat from the course descriptions.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mThis is the title of the program: Atlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate[0m

[33mWrite a short congratulatory message that I can send to my colleagues to announce this partnership. [0m

[33mStart with: [0m[33m"[0m[33m[[0m[33mPartner[0m[33m][0m[33m has signed for a [0m[33m!"[0m
[33mThen a description of why the topic is important.[0m
[33mThen a description of why the Partner is such a good fit for this topic.[0m
[33mAnnouncement should be one paragraph, [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m-[0m[1;33m70[0m[33m words long.[0m

[33mUse the following example announcements as context for this task.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mArista Networks has signed for a Network Automation Professional Certificate! Arista is the industry leader[0m
[33min cloud networking for large data center, campus and routing environments [0m[1;33m([0m[33m$90bn market cap[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and is the [0m
[33mprimary networking services provider for big tech companies like Microsoft and Meta. [0m

[33mThe American Nurses Association has signed on for a Business Skills for Nurses certificate! With over [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m [0m
[33mmillion members, the ANA is the largest nursing industry association in the United States, with workforce [0m
[33mdevelopment a critical part of its mission. This is part of a broader initiative across LinkedIn to get [0m
[33mmore nurses on the platform. Per discussion with the ANA, the certificate will be unlocked for six months. [0m

[33mMozilla has signed on for a Javascript Foundations Professional Certificate! As an early leader in open [0m
[33msource software for the internet, Mozilla advocates for open web standards, net neutrality, and user [0m
[33mprivacy. Their Developer Network [0m[1;33m([0m[33mMDN[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m is the go-to resource for web development documentation with over [0m
[33m17M monthly users. As the third-most in-demand programming language for our users [0m[1;33m([0m[33mafter Python and Java[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, [0m
[33mthis certificate on Javascript fills an important gap in our library. We plan to follow this with [0m
[33mcertificates on HTML and CSS.[0m

[33mC++ Institute has signed for a C++ Programming Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. C++ is [0m
[33mthe third-most popular programming language after Python and C. The C++ Institute [0m[1;33m([0m[33ma subsidiary of OpenEDG[0m[1;33m)[0m
[33mis the market leader in C++ training and certification.[0m

[33mKong has signed for a Microservices Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. Microservices is the[0m
[33mmost popular architecture pattern for developers, and this certificate will complement our certificates on [0m
[33mDocker and devops. Kong is a recognized leader in the field of microservices and API management.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mprinciples, scrum roles, Jira Query Language [0m[1;33m([0m[33mJQL[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, and more.[0m

[33mclassify epics, and work with dashboards in Jira. Review lessons from all three courses in this series.[0m
[33m**Mistakes to Avoid in Agile Project Management**: Learn how you can avoid common pitfalls of working in [0m
[33magile project management.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mThe length of your answer should be between [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m and [0m[1;33m60[0m[33m words.[0m

[33mBeginning web developers or programmers without experience in Javascript[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Docker curriculum[0m
[33mSofware developers and DevOps Engineers[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: DevOps curriculum[0m
[33mDevOps Engineers, and developer [0m[33m/[0m[33m IT needing a basic understanding of DevOps practices[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Microservices curriculum[0m
[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Introduction to Data Science**: Get to know the exciting world of data science in this beginner-friendly [0m
[33mcourse.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m: The Basics**: Learn to understand your data using basics of statistics, such as[0m
[33mdefining the middle, mean, and median of your data set; measuring the standard deviation; and finding [0m
[33moutliers.[0m
[33m**Statistics Foundations [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m: Using Data Sets**: Go beyond the basics of statistics with practical, [0m
[33mexample-based lessons to learn how data sets and statistics are used in the real world.[0m
[33m**Learning Python**: Get started with Python, the popular and highly-readable object-oriented language.[0m
[33m**Python Data Analysis**: Interested in using Python for data analysis? Learn how to use Python, NumPy, and[0m
[33mpandas together to analyze data sets large and small.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[33mDevelopers and architects who need to skill up on designing, building, and migrating systems to a [0m
[33mmicroservices architecture.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: C++ curriculum[0m
[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m [0m
[33mto programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are likely higher intent to be [0m
[33msoftware developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic conversational knowledge with [0m
[33mprogramming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced topics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to writing their [0m
[33mown programs and applications.[0m
[33m* Existing C++ programmers who want to take their skills to the next level by mastering more advanced [0m
[33mconcepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m
[33m* Developers coming from other programming languages who need to get up to speed with C++ syntax, [0m
[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mEXAMPLE: Business Skills for Nurses curriculum[0m
[33mNurses who are keen to grow into mgmt positions[0m
[33m================================[0m

[33mLook at this list of course titles and descriptions for a new curriculum:[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33m**Learning the JavaScript Language**: Gain a conversant understanding of JavaScript, including variables, [0m
[33mtypes, objects, arrays, operators, control structures, loops, and functions.[0m
[33m**JavaScript Essential Training**: Get hands-on experience scripting in JavaScript. Learn how to work with [0m
[33mobjects, variables, data types, conditionals, functions, loops, the DOM, and more.[0m

[33m================================[0m

[33mHow would you describe the audience for this learning path? Your answer should not be longer than [0m[1;33m100[0m[33m [0m
[33mwords.[0m

[1;32m───────────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ─────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m# Audience for JavaScript Learning Path[0m

[34mThis learning path is designed for:[0m

[1;34m1[0m[34m. Complete beginners with no prior JavaScript experience who want to learn the fundamentals of the [0m
[34mlanguage from scratch.[0m

[1;34m2[0m[34m. Web development enthusiasts looking to add basic JavaScript skills to their toolkit.[0m

[1;34m3[0m[34m. Professionals in adjacent technical fields [0m[1;34m([0m[34msuch as HTML/CSS developers, designers, or IT staff[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m who [0m
[34mneed to understand JavaScript basics for their roles.[0m

[34mThe curriculum builds from foundational concepts to hands-on practice, making it suitable for those seeking[0m
[34mto establish core JavaScript competency without advanced programming knowledge.[0m

[33mbuild more resilient systems. These courses cover everything from beginner foundations to advanced patterns[0m
[33mand refactoring codebases. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mDevOps is not a framework or a workflow. DevOps ensures collaboration and communication between software [0m
[33mengineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to review the [0m
[33mfundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by mastering the[0m
[33mfundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, efficient code. By the end,[0m
[33myou'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs and applications. Tune in, pass the [0m
[33mfinal exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. Software [0m
[33mdevelopers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether you are new to [0m
[33mDocker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and [0m
[33mearn your certificate.[0m

[33mto master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions to advanced topics such as [0m
[33masynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and real-time feedback, you'll gain the [0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, and use [0m
[33mthis overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m1[0m[33m. **Introduction**: Introduce the topic or subject matter.[0m
[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be learned.[0m
[1;33m4[0m[33m. **Call to Action**: The final sentence should always be [0m[33m"Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate."[0m

[33mdevelopment a critical part of its mission. This is part of a broader initiative across LinkedIn to get [0m
[33mmore nurses on the platform. Per discussion with the ANA, the certificate will be unlocked for six months. [0m

[34mdatabase integration[0m

[33mWrite a short congratulatory message that I can send to my colleagues to announce this partnership. [0m

[33mStart with: [0m[33m"[0m[33m[[0m[33mPartner[0m[33m][0m[33m has signed for a [0m[33m!"[0m
[33mThen a description of why the topic is important.[0m
[33mThen a description of why the Partner is such a good fit for this topic.[0m
[33mAnnouncement should be one paragraph, [0m[1;33m40[0m[33m-[0m[1;33m70[0m[33m words long.[0m

[33mUse the following example announcements as context for this task.[0m

[33m================================[0m
[33mArista Networks has signed for a Network Automation Professional Certificate! Arista is the industry leader[0m
[33min cloud networking for large data center, campus and routing environments [0m[1;33m([0m[33m$90bn market cap[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and is the [0m
[33mprimary networking services provider for big tech companies like Microsoft and Meta. [0m

[33mThe American Nurses Association has signed on for a Business Skills for Nurses certificate! With over [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m [0m
[33mmillion members, the ANA is the largest nursing industry association in the United States, with workforce [0m
[33mdevelopment a critical part of its mission. This is part of a broader initiative across LinkedIn to get [0m
[33mmore nurses on the platform. Per discussion with the ANA, the certificate will be unlocked for six months. [0m

[33mMozilla has signed on for a Javascript Foundations Professional Certificate! As an early leader in open [0m
[33msource software for the internet, Mozilla advocates for open web standards, net neutrality, and user [0m
[33mprivacy. Their Developer Network [0m[1;33m([0m[33mMDN[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m is the go-to resource for web development documentation with over [0m
[33m17M monthly users. As the third-most in-demand programming language for our users [0m[1;33m([0m[33mafter Python and Java[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, [0m
[33mthis certificate on Javascript fills an important gap in our library. We plan to follow this with [0m
[33mcertificates on HTML and CSS.[0m

[33mC++ Institute has signed for a C++ Programming Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. C++ is [0m
[33mthe third-most popular programming language after Python and C. The C++ Institute [0m[1;33m([0m[33ma subsidiary of OpenEDG[0m[1;33m)[0m
[33mis the market leader in C++ training and certification.[0m

[33mKong has signed for a Microservices Professional Certificate, for publication in FYQ1. Microservices is the[0m
[33mmost popular architecture pattern for developers, and this certificate will complement our certificates on [0m
[33mDocker and devops. Kong is a recognized leader in the field of microservices and API management.[0m
[33m================================[0m

[1;32m───────────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ─────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34mJetBrains has signed for a Java Foundations Professional Certificate! Java remains one of the most [0m
[34min-demand programming languages globally, powering enterprise applications, Android development, and cloud [0m
[34mservices across industries. JetBrains, creator of IntelliJ IDEA [0m[1;34m([0m[34mthe leading Java IDE[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m and trusted by over [0m
[1;34m15[0m[34m million developers worldwide, brings unmatched expertise to this partnership. Their deep understanding [0m
[34mof Java ecosystems and developer workflows makes them the perfect collaborator to help professionals master[0m
[34mthis essential language.[0m

[33mThis audience is a little different from the Python certificate audience. While Python is a [0m
[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m to programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are [0m
[33mlikely higher intent to be software developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic [0m
[33mconversational knowledge with programming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced [0m
[33mtopics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to [0m
[33mwriting their own programs and applications.[0m

[33madvanced concepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m

[33mfundamentals, and common design patterns.[0m

[33mrevenue.[0m

[33msoftware engineers [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDev[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m and IT operations [0m[1;33m([0m[33mOps[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. Whether you are new to DevOps or looking to [0m
[33mreview the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your [0m
[33mcertificate.[0m

[33mC++ is renowned for its performance, control, and versatility. Ready to get started? Begin by [0m
[33mmastering the fundamentals and then progress to proven techniques for writing well-organized, [0m
[33mefficient code. By the end, you'll have the knowledge you need to create your own C++ programs [0m
[33mand applications. Tune in, pass the final exam, and earn your professional certificate.[0m

[33mContainers help developers pack up their applications, ensuring they run smoothly anywhere. [0m
[33mSoftware developers need to understand these technologies to deliver software as a team. Whether [0m
[33myou are new to Docker or looking to review the fundamentals, these courses can help. Tune in, [0m
[33mpass the final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mJavaScript is the key to a career in front-end development. These courses equip you with [0m
[33messential skills to master the language, from fundamental concepts like variables and functions [0m
[33mto advanced topics such as asynchronous tasks and DOM scripting. With hands-on practice and [0m
[33mreal-time feedback, you'll gain the expertise needed to excel in web development. Tune in, pass [0m
[33mthe final exam, and earn your certificate.[0m

[33mteammates and your customers.[0m

[33mhelp you bolster your emotional intelligence and communicate more effectively with sales [0m
[33mprospects.[0m
[33m**Sales Prospecting: How to Connect with Todayâ€™s Busy Buyers**: Gain a practical understanding [0m

[33mcallers face and how to overcome them.[0m

[33msales negotiations different and how to negotiate deals that stick.[0m
[33m**Persuasive Selling**: Learn the eight psychological concepts that play an integral role in the [0m
[33msales process, and how you can use these concepts to refine your sales approach.[0m
[33m**Sales Time Management**: Learn practical techniques, as a salesperson, to increase sales, hit [0m
[33mtargets, and decrease stress through better time management.[0m

[33mHow would you describe this learning path? Structure your answer like the examples given above, [0m
[33mand use this overall pattern:[0m

[1;33m2[0m[33m. **Value Proposition**: Highlight the benefits or outcomes of engaging with the content.[0m
[1;33m3[0m[33m. **Course Overview**: Provide a brief overview of what the courses cover or what skills will be[0m
[33mlearned.[0m

[33mearn your certificate."[0m

[33m"gateway drug"[0m[33m to programming for a very wide audience, people who are interested in C++ are [0m
[33mlikely higher intent to be software developers. As such, this certificate presumes some basic [0m
[33mconversational knowledge with programming, and ramps up more quickly from beginner to advanced [0m
[33mtopics.[0m
[33mThree personas:[0m
[33m* Beginners who want to start learning C++ programming from scratch and quickly progress to [0m

[33madvanced concepts, techniques, and best practices.[0m

[33mHere's a curriculum to analyze:[0m

[1;33m<[0m[1;33mcourse[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>[0m
[33mPython Data Analysis[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<description>[0m
[33m&lt;p&gt;Data science has transformed the way that government and industry leaders look at both [0m
[33mspecific problems and the world at large. Curious about how data analysis works in practice? In [0m
[33mthis course, instructor Michele Vallisneri explains what it takes to get started with data [0m
[33mscience using Python.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;&lt;p&gt;Michele demonstrates how to set up your analysis [0m
[33menvironment and provides a refresher on the basics of working with data structures in Python. [0m
[33mThen, he jumps into the big stuff: the power of arrays, indexing, and tables in NumPy and pandas.[0m
[33mHe also guides you through two sample big-data projects: using NumPy to identify and visualize [0m
[33mweather patterns and using pandas to analyze the popularity of baby names over the last century. [0m
[33mChallenges issued along the way help you practice what you've learned. Plus, learn about the [0m
[33mskills in the basic tasks of data analysis: importing and wrangling, summarizing and visualizing,[0m
[33mmodeling, and reasoning. &lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;&lt;p&gt;This course is integrated with GitHub Codespaces, an [0m
[33minstant cloud developer environment that offers all the functionality of your favorite IDE [0m
[33mwithout the need for any local machine setup. With GitHub Codespaces, you can get hands-on [0m
[33mpractice from any machine, at any timeâ€”all while using a tool that youâ€™ll likely encounter in[0m
[33mthe workplace. Check out the â€œSet up: Using Codespacesâ€ video to learn how to get [0m
[33mstarted.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mdescription[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<toc>[0m
[33m# Python Data Analysis[0m
[33m## Introduction[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFrom data to insight with Python        [0m[1;33m55[0m[33m      [0m[33mUsing Python, you can analyze data [0m
[33mrapidly using powerful tools adopted by a large and helpful community. This video shows you how [0m
[33mto load a weather dataset and create an impressive visualization using just a few lines of code, [0m
[33mwhich the instructor works through in detail in chapter four of this course.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWhat you need to know   [0m[1;33m82[0m[33m      [0m[33mTo learn the most from this course, you need an [0m
[33melementary knowledge of the Python language, which you can obtain from other LinkedIn Learning [0m
[33mcourses. However Python's data structures—which are crucial to data analysis—are reviewed in this[0m
[33mcourse.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWhat is new in this update      [0m[1;33m43[0m[33m      [0m[33mLike the original version, this course covers the[0m
[33mfoundations of data analysis with Python—data structures, NumPy, pandas, and Matplotlib—using [0m
[33mpractical real-world examples. The course is updated to reflect recent changes and new features [0m
[33min the interfaces of those modules and in the Python language. GitHub Codespaces and CoderPad [0m
[33mchallenges have been added to the course so you can learn interactively and explore on your own.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSet up: Using Codespaces        [0m[1;33m241[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCoderPad challenges     [0m[1;33m127[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m. Python Data Structures[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWarmup with Python loops        [0m[1;33m328[0m[33m     [0m[33mThere are many use cases in data analysis where [0m
[33myou need to operate on data in a sequential fashion. In Python, you do so with looping [0m
[33mconstructs. This video provides a refresher on the Python loop syntax by solving a simple [0m
[33mproblem—finding all the ways in which you can break a dollar into a set of coins.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mTuples, lists, and the slicing syntax   [0m[1;33m406[0m[33m     [0m[33mThe built-in sequence types—tuples, [0m
[33mlists, ranges, strings, and buffers—in which data elements are associated with indices, set the [0m
[33mbasic framework for accessing sequential data in Python and transfer directly to NumPy. This [0m
[33mvideo provides a refresher on the creation and indexing of sequences, reviews the important [0m
[33mdistinction between mutable and immutable types, and highlights the slicing interface.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDictionaries and sets   [0m[1;33m272[0m[33m     [0m[33mPython dicts associate unique keys with values, while [0m
[33msets express collections of data items without duplication. These data types complement sequences[0m
[33min many common data-analysis tasks, and provide a basis for pandas DataFrames. This video [0m
[33mprovides a review of the creation, updating, and indexing of Python dicts and sets.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mComprehensions  [0m[1;33m228[0m[33m     [0m[33mPython comprehensions provide a readable and expedient way to [0m
[33mcreate, transform, and filter sequences, dicts, and sets; they are used extensively in the next [0m
[33mchapter. This video provides a review of the comprehension syntax—including multilevel [0m
[33mcomprehensions—and draws analogies to Python loops.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mData classes    [0m[1;33m270[0m[33m     [0m[33mData classes are the best way to encode and process structured, [0m
[33mheterogeneous data in Python. This video provides a review of their creation and use as well as [0m
[33mtheir validation using Pydantic.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m. Project: Finding Anagrams[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: Finding anagrams      [0m[1;33m63[0m[33m      [0m[33mIn this chapter, you can practice Python data [0m
[33mstructures with a simple example on textual data—listing and analyzing anagrams in English and [0m
[33mFrench dictionaries. This video discusses the basic technique [0m[1;33m([0m[33msignature[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m that is used to find [0m
[33managrams and outlines the general strategy to map the technique to data structures.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mLoading dictionaries from text files    [0m[1;33m183[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn many cases, parsing a text file [0m
[33mmanually is the fastest way to complete a simple data analysis task. This video shows how to load[0m
[33ma list of words from a file, and briefly discusses how Unicode allow you to handle international [0m
[33mcharacter sets transparently.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFinding anagrams        [0m[1;33m257[0m[33m     [0m[33mSee how to use Python comprehensions to create Python [0m
[33mdicts that let you list anagrams and sort them in various way. These examples show the [0m
[33mflexibility and legibility of Python comprehensions.[0m
[33m        [0m[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33m> Code challenge: Find palindromes    [0m[1;33m600[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSolution: Find palindromes      [0m[1;33m66[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m. NumPy[0m
[33m        [0m[33mNumPy overview  [0m[1;33m246[0m[33m     [0m[33mWhenever you need to manage large one-dimensional or [0m
[33mmulti-dimensional collections of homogeneous data—such as numerical arrays—you can turn to the [0m
[33mNumPy library, which provides speed and memory savings. NumPy is also a basic building block to [0m
[33minterface with C or Fortran code. This video introduces the basic structure of NumPy arrays and [0m
[33mthe notion of dtype.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCreating NumPy arrays   [0m[1;33m315[0m[33m     [0m[33mThere are various ways to create NumPy arrays, depending [0m
[33mon your needs. Learn how to make empty arrays, transform Python data structures into arrays, and [0m
[33mload arrays from files in various formats.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIndexing NumPy arrays   [0m[1;33m386[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn the analysis of large data collections, you often need[0m
[33mto focus on subsets of data or restructure its storage. Learn how to select subarrays by [0m
[33mspecifying boundaries and strides [0m[1;33m([0m[33mslicing[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, or by applying conditions to the data [0m[1;33m([0m[33mfancy [0m
[33mindexing[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m. This video also discusses restructuring data—for example, adding or removing axes—and [0m
[33mthe distinction between views and copies.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDoing math with NumPy arrays    [0m[1;33m345[0m[33m     [0m[33mWith NumPy, speed and agility arise from the [0m
[33mability to operate on entire arrays at once. Learn how to perform mathematical operations that [0m
[33mtransform arrays or combine them together, while preserving or modifying their structure.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSpecial arrays: Records and dates       [0m[1;33m286[0m[33m     [0m[33mNumPy offers very convenient facilities [0m
[33mfor managing data of different types together using record arrays, and handling dates with the [0m
[33mdatetime64 dtype. Learn how to create and use record arrays as well as datetime64 data.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m. Project: Weather Data[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: Analyzing weather     [0m[1;33m54[0m[33m      [0m[33mIn this chapter, you can practice using NumPy by [0m
[33mloading, modifying, and plotting weather data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric [0m
[33mAdministration. This video examines the files that are going to be analyzed and outlines the [0m
[33manalysis goals.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mLoading station and temperature data    [0m[1;33m290[0m[33m     [0m[33mNumPy allows you to load data in many [0m
[33mdifferent formats without writing custom code. Learn how to use Python to download files from the[0m
[33mweb and use NumPy to load a fixed-width table.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCleaning weather data   [0m[1;33m260[0m[33m     [0m[33mData often needs to be cleaned or otherwise edited before[0m
[33manalyzing it. Learn how to integrate missing data in the weather files you have loaded using a [0m
[33msimple interpolation technique.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSmoothing and plotting time series      [0m[1;33m299[0m[33m     [0m[33mMany interesting datasets are organized [0m
[33mas a time series—numerical sequences sorted by date and time. Learn how to use NumPy to perform [0m
[33mbasic time series analysis tasks—computing means and standard deviations, and smoothing time [0m
[33mseries.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWeather charts  [0m[1;33m280[0m[33m     [0m[33mUsing NumPy and Matplotlib together, you can create insightful [0m
[33mvisualizations with little effort. Learn how to compute daily temperature records and plot [0m
[33mweather charts in the style of the New York Times.[0m
[33m        [0m[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33m> Code challenge: Temperature anomaly [0m[1;33m600[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSolution: Temperature anomaly   [0m[1;33m74[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m5[0m[33m. pandas[0m
[33m        [0m[33mpandas overview [0m[1;33m98[0m[33m      [0m[33mpandas' powerful table objects [0m[1;33m([0m[33mDataFrames[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m are extremely useful [0m
[33min the analysis of structured data that associates textual, date, and numerical information. This[0m
[33mvideo introduces the basic structure of pandas Series and DataFrames, and compares them with [0m
[33mNumPy arrays. It also highlights recent performance improvements made possible by Apache Arrow.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mpandas DataFrames and Series    [0m[1;33m443[0m[33m     [0m[33mTo be efficient in data analysis, you often need [0m
[33mto reorganize tables and to select subsets of their rows or columns. Learn how to create [0m
[33mDataFrames from Python data structures or from files, inspect DataFrames, extract and modify [0m
[33mtheir columns, and select data based on conditions—pandas' version of fancy indexing and the [0m
[33mquery method.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIndexing in pandas      [0m[1;33m252[0m[33m     [0m[33mOnce you have your data organized, you may need to find [0m
[33mthe specific records you want. Learn how to index DataFrames with NumPy-like indexing, or by [0m
[33mcreating indexes. This video also discusses pandas' powerful but confusing MultiIndexes.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mMath and plotting in pandas     [0m[1;33m389[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn data analysis, you often need to transform [0m
[33mtables by applying operations to one or more columns. Visualizing the transformed datasets is [0m
[33malso crucial to understanding them. Learn about the basics of performing mathematical operations [0m
[33mand plotting with pandas.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDatabase operations in pandas   [0m[1;33m418[0m[33m     [0m[33mWhile pandas is not a database, you can use it to[0m
[33mcombine, merge, and compare tables just as you would with a relational database. Learn about the [0m
[33mbasics of concatenating, joining, and comparing pandas DataFrames.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m6[0m[33m. Project: Baby Names[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: Analyzing baby names  [0m[1;33m38[0m[33m      [0m[33mIn this chapter, you can practice using pandas by[0m
[33manalyzing the popularity of baby names in the US as recorded by the Social Security [0m
[33mAdministration. This video examines the files that are going to be analyzed and outlines the [0m
[33manalysis goals.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mLoading name datasets   [0m[1;33m169[0m[33m     [0m[33mUsing Python and its libraries, you can gather and [0m
[33morganize data very efficiently. See how to download compressed archives from the web, use Python [0m
[33mto open them, load their contents, concatenate them into DataFrames, and save the resulting [0m
[33mcleaned data.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mComparing name popularity       [0m[1;33m312[0m[33m     [0m[33mOrganizing pandas DataFrames with the appropriate[0m
[33mindex is important to gain easy access to the records you seek. Learn how to create a MultiIndex [0m
[33mfor your dataset, sort it by index value, and compare the popularity of common and similar names [0m
[33mby plotting the corresponding time series together. Parallel and stacked plots of timelines are [0m
[33moften insightful visualizations.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCompiling top tens      [0m[1;33m186[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn many cases, you need to sort and subset DataFrames [0m
[33mbased on values rather than indices. Learn how to find the top ten names over a range of years, [0m
[33mwhich involves sorting the data, dropping columns and rows, and joining DataFrames together. [0m
[33mThese are examples of pandas operations that are broadly useful.[0m
[33m        [0m[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33m> Code challenge: Unisex names        [0m[1;33m600[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSolution: Unisex names  [0m[1;33m114[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m7[0m[33m. Importing and Wrangling Data with pandas[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: The structure of data [0m[1;33m112[0m[33m     [0m[33mThe best way to organize data is the [0m
[33mcase/variable structure, which is implemented directly with rows and columns in pandas [0m
[33mDataFrames. It is also important to identify quantitative and categorical variables to encode [0m
[33mthem correctly. This video discusses how to include important metadata and data descriptors in a [0m
[33mdata dictionary.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mImporting data with pandas      [0m[1;33m234[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn the real world, data comes from many sources [0m
[33min many formats. pandas excels at importing many different file types—including comma-separated [0m
[33mvalues [0m[1;33m([0m[33mCSV[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m, Excel, HDF, Apache Arrow, and more. This video demonstrates data importing in [0m
[33mpandas.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCleaning data   [0m[1;33m348[0m[33m     [0m[33mNewly acquired data is seldom uniform and entirely well-formed. [0m
[33mThis video exemplifies how data may be cleaned with string operations, date transformations, [0m
[33mduplicate removal, and proper encoding of categorical variables.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFiltering, reshaping, and tidying data  [0m[1;33m403[0m[33m     [0m[33mAfter cleaning data, you need to identify[0m
[33mthe records that are important to analysis and cast them in structures that emphasize relevant [0m
[33minformation. This video also introduces the tidy data arrangement and demonstrates melting and [0m
[33munmelting operations to obtain it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSimulating data [0m[1;33m330[0m[33m     [0m[33mGenerating synthetic data is an important tool to test an [0m
[33manalysis or a newly built tool. This video demonstrates data simulation using the Python package [0m
[33mfaker.[0m
[33m        [0m[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33m> Code challenge: Country rankings    [0m[1;33m600[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSolution: Country rankings      [0m[1;33m94[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m8[0m[33m. Summarizing and Visualizing Data[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: Exploring data        [0m[1;33m80[0m[33m      [0m[33mData summaries and visualizations are the [0m
[33mfundamental tools of exploratory data analysis—where you seek to understand a dataset—and [0m
[33mstorytelling with data—where you share the insights effectively and memorably. This chapter uses [0m
[33mdatasets from the Gapminder project, which reveals surprising truths about world-wide trends with[0m
[33mcarefully curated data.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSummarizing quantitative data   [0m[1;33m257[0m[33m     [0m[33mDescriptive statistics are indispensable to [0m
[33munderstand quantitative data by distilling typical values and their variation to observables such[0m
[33mas mean, median, variance, and quantiles. This video demonstrates the computation of descriptive [0m
[33mstatistics in pandas.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mVisualizing distributions       [0m[1;33m354[0m[33m     [0m[33mVisualizations such as box plots, histograms, and[0m
[33mdensity plots provide immediate insight into the variation of variables in populations and their [0m
[33msubgroups. Learn how to visualize distributions with pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mComparing quantitative variables        [0m[1;33m325[0m[33m     [0m[33mCorrelation statistics and multivariable [0m
[33mplots help you understand how data variables change together. Learn how to create multivariate [0m
[33mplots with pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn, and see how to use all encoding channels—position, [0m
[33mcolor, size, and texture—to plot more than two variables together.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSummarizing and visualizing categorical data    [0m[1;33m298[0m[33m     [0m[33mDescriptive statistics for [0m
[33mcategorical data include counts and proportions, which can be organized in pivot and stratified [0m
[33mtables and visualized in a variety of bar and pie plots. Learn how to use pandas to create [0m
[33msummaries and visualizations.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m9[0m[33m. Introduction to Data Modeling[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: Understanding data    [0m[1;33m152[0m[33m     [0m[33mStatistics is the science of learning from data, [0m
[33mand statistical modeling helps you to identify relationships between variables and make [0m
[33mpredictions about the future. This chapter returns to the Gapminder data and develops simple [0m
[33mmodels to quantify trends and make hypotheses.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFitting models to data  [0m[1;33m355[0m[33m     [0m[33mLinear regression is the simplest form of statistical [0m
[33mmodeling, which quantifies the effect of predictor variables on output variables. This video [0m
[33mdemonstrates simple and multiple linear regression with the user-friendly but sophisticated [0m
[33mPython package statsmodels, using the standard tilde formula notation.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mModel evaluation and selection  [0m[1;33m308[0m[33m     [0m[33mAfter fitting a model, it's important to [0m
[33munderstand if it does a good job of representing your data. This video demonstrates model [0m
[33mevaluation using plotting and simple statistics such as mean square error and R squared. It also [0m
[33mdiscusses strategies to select among competing models and refine partially successful models.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mTesting hypotheses with Monte Carlo     [0m[1;33m308[0m[33m     [0m[33mThe possibility of quickly performing a [0m
[33mlarge number of simulations on a computer has revolutionized statistics, replacing complicated [0m
[33mmathematics with simple, pragmatic approaches. This video demonstrates the idea of testing a [0m
[33mhypothesis about data by computing statistics on a population of simulated data replications.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mA taste of machine learning     [0m[1;33m362[0m[33m     [0m[33mMachine learning goes beyond data analysis by [0m
[33mteaching machines how to learn from data, usually in large quantities. This video demonstrates a [0m
[33msimple classification analysis using the Python package scikit-learn.[0m
[33m        [0m[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33m> Code challenge: Gapminder model fit [0m[1;33m600[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSolution: Gapminder model fit   [0m[1;33m67[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m10[0m[33m. Project: COVID-[0m[1;33m19[0m[33m Data[0m
[33m        [0m[33mOverview: COVID-[0m[1;33m19[0m[33m data [0m[1;33m132[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSummarizing COVID-[0m[1;33m19[0m[33m data       [0m[1;33m260[0m
[33m        [0m[33mVisualizing COVID-[0m[1;33m19[0m[33m data       [0m[1;33m359[0m
[33m        [0m[33mModeling COVID-[0m[1;33m19[0m[33m data  [0m[1;33m285[0m

[33mvideo suggests a few.[0m

[33mhelp of Wolfram Language. While you can build complicated models from scratch, you can also use [0m
[33many of the existing, pre-trained models on different inputs like text, numbers, and images. This [0m
[33mcourse provides an introduction to the many machine learning functions available for such [0m
[33mwide-ranging tasks as image identification, text recognition, sentiment classification and [0m
[33mothers. Explore the automated machine learning capabilities of Wolfram Language through examples,[0m
[33mand learn to execute simple machine learning tasks on different types of inputs, use both named [0m
[33mand custom-trained models to perform classification tasks, and apply machine learning to computer[0m
[33mvision, text, and natural language processing tasks.[0m

[1;33m<[0m[1;33mcourse[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>[0m
[33mMachine Learning Foundations: Probability[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<description>[0m
[33m&lt;p&gt;If you work with machine learning models, you probably already know that your models are[0m
[33mbased on estimation and approximation. Probability is everything and moreâ€”but how do you [0m
[33mleverage it to your advantage?&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;&lt;p&gt;In this course, the third part of the Machine [0m
[33mLearning Foundations series, join instructor Terezija Semenski for an in-depth exploration of [0m
[33mprobability, its core concepts and functionalities, and how to use it to design, implement, and [0m
[33mmanage more reliable machine learning algorithms. Along the way, discover some of the most [0m
[33messential tools and techniques you need to know for successful probabilistic modeling, pulling [0m
[33mfrom the rules of probability, joint and marginal probability, discrete probability [0m
[33mdistributions, continuous probability distributions, Bayes' theorem, and more.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mdescription[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<toc>[0m
[33m# Machine Learning Foundations: Probability[0m
[33m## Introduction[0m
[33m        [0m[33mProbability for machine learning        [0m[1;33m39[0m[33m      [0m[33mTake a closer look at the importance of [0m
[33mprobability for machine learning and explore the goals of this course.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWhat you should know    [0m[1;33m62[0m[33m      [0m[33mBefore starting this course, explore what skills and [0m
[33mknowledge you will need to have to be successful in this course. Additionally, explore all [0m
[33minstallation requirements you need to set up before you proceed.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m. Introduction to Probability[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDefining probability    [0m[1;33m175[0m[33m     [0m[33mUnderstand what probability is and get familiar with [0m
[33mbasic concepts of probability. You'll also explore reasons why its knowledge is a prerequisite [0m
[33mfor machine learning practitioners. [0m
[33m        [0m[33mApplications of probability in ML       [0m[1;33m179[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will explore [0m
[33mapplications of probability in machine learning. It is used when working with neural networks and[0m
[33mits concepts and methods are present in many fields of ML, for example when solving problems of [0m
[33moptimizing the ML model.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSample space and events [0m[1;33m235[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will learn what sample space and [0m
[33mevents are and explore them on different real-world examples in order to understand the [0m
[33mprobability of those events.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mRandom variables        [0m[1;33m173[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will explore what a random variable [0m
[33mis, how to calculate one, and the importance of a continuous random variable.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mExamples of probability [0m[1;33m298[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore more advanced examples of [0m
[33mprobability in order to understand it.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m. The Rules of Probability[0m
[33m        [0m[33mProbability of an event [0m[1;33m213[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn what the probability of an [0m
[33mevent is, how to calculate one, and apply it by coding examples in NumPy.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe sum rule    [0m[1;33m114[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn what mutually exclusive events are [0m
[33mand explore how and when to apply the formula for the sum rule. It tells you about the [0m
[33mprobability of two events A or B happening. [0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe product rule        [0m[1;33m148[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn how and when to apply the [0m
[33mformula for the product rule.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe sum rule extended   [0m[1;33m143[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will explore how to apply the sum rule[0m
[33min a case when you have events that aren't mutually exclusive.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mConditional probability [0m[1;33m193[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will learn the difference between [0m
[33mindependent and dependent events so you can explore conditional probability which is one of the [0m
[33mmost important concepts in ML.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mTotal probability       [0m[1;33m259[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will learn what total probability is, [0m
[33mwhen it is used, and how to calculate the total probability.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m. The Joint and Marginal Probability[0m
[33m        [0m[33mJoint and marginal probability  [0m[1;33m131[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you will be introduced to joint [0m
[33mand marginal probability and discover the difference between them and when and why they are used.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mJoint probability tables        [0m[1;33m194[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore joint probabilities[0m
[33musing simple tables.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe chain rule for probability  [0m[1;33m211[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn about the chain rule [0m
[33mfor probability. This rule lets you break down a joint probability into the product of smaller [0m
[33mjoint probabilities and conditional probabilities.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m. Discrete Probability Distributions[0m
[33m        [0m[33mProbability distributions       [0m[1;33m165[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn what probability [0m
[33mdistribution is and its importance in ML. The primary reason for sampling from a probability [0m
[33mdistribution is to initialize the network before training.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mHistograms and probability      [0m[1;33m205[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn what histograms are [0m
[33mand their importance as discrete representations of a probability distribution.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDiscrete probability distribution       [0m[1;33m136[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn what is a [0m
[33mdiscrete probability distribution and its most important types.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe binomial distribution       [0m[1;33m282[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore what binomial [0m
[33mdistribution is and learn a formula that can be applied to calculate it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe Bernoulli distribution      [0m[1;33m151[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore the special case of[0m
[33mbinomial distribution called Bernoulli distribution and how to calculate it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe Poisson distribution        [0m[1;33m159[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn a case when you know only the average number [0m
[33mof events that happen over some interval but don't know the probability of an event for a [0m
[33mparticular trial, you can use the Poisson distribution. You'll also learn the formula used to [0m
[33mcalculate it.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m5[0m[33m. Continuous Probability Distributions[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe continuous probability distribution [0m[1;33m235[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore what [0m
[33mcontinuous probability distribution is and the difference between a discrete distribution and [0m
[33mcontinuous probability distribution.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mCentral limit theorem   [0m[1;33m202[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn how and when the central [0m
[33mlimit theorem should be applied. [0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe law of large numbers        [0m[1;33m96[0m[33m      [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn the concept related [0m
[33mto the central limit theorem, why it is important, and when to use it.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m6[0m[33m. The Bayes' Theorem[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIntroduction to Bayes' theorem  [0m[1;33m258[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll define Bayes’ theorem, [0m
[33mwhich will show you the correct way to compare conditional probabilities.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mExample of Bayes' theorem in practice   [0m[1;33m199[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, you'll explore Bayes' [0m
[33mtheorem on a simple example in order to understand its relation to the marginal probability.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mNaive Bayes' clasifier  [0m[1;33m141[0m[33m     [0m[33mThe Naive Bayes' classifier is one of the most important [0m
[33mapplications of Bayes' theorem in ML that provides for each class, the probability that a given [0m
[33mfeature vector belongs to that class.[0m
[33m## Conclusion[0m
[33m        [0m[33mNext steps      [0m[1;33m46[0m[33m      [0m[33mIn this video, you'll learn where to go from here.[0m

[1;33m<[0m[1;33mcourse[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>[0m
[33mMachine Learning Foundations: Statistics[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<description>[0m
[33mMachine learning models have revolutionized how we work, across a multitude of industries. But [0m
[33mgoing deeper with ML models and actually understanding how they work will allow you to optimize [0m
[33mperformance, innovate, troubleshoot issues, and create new and more efficient ML models. In this [0m
[33mcourse,  the fourth part of the &lt;i&gt;Machine Learning Foundations&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mi[0m[33m&gt; series, Terezija [0m
[33mSemenski explains how a deep understanding of statistics can help you excel when it comes to [0m
[33mmachine learning projects. Terezija shows how statistics plays a large role in machine learning [0m
[33mâ€”beyond just crunching numbersâ€”and shows you how to use statistics to gain insights into the [0m
[33mdata, understand the uncertainties associated with predictions, and make data-driven decisions [0m
[33mwith confidence.[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mdescription[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<toc>[0m
[33m# Machine Learning Foundations: Statistics[0m
[33m## Introduction[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFoundations of statistics for machine learning  [0m[1;33m46[0m[33m      [0m[33mTake a closer look at the [0m
[33mimportance of statistics for machine learning and explore the goals of this course.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mWhat you should know    [0m[1;33m65[0m[33m      [0m[33mBefore starting this course, explore what skills and [0m
[33mknowledge you need to have to be successful in this course. Discover the installation [0m
[33mrequirements you need to set up before you proceed.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m. Introduction to Statistics[0m
[33m        [0m[33mDefining statistics     [0m[1;33m157[0m[33m     [0m[33mUnderstand what statistics is and get familiar with basic[0m
[33mconcepts of statistics. Explore reasons why its knowledge is a prerequisite for machine learning [0m
[33mpractitioners. Picking data properly is extremely important because it means a difference between[0m
[33man ML system that learns from your data and provides useful results and a system that fails.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mApplications of statistics in ML        [0m[1;33m178[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore applications of statistics in [0m
[33mmachine learning. It is used in every applied ML project from exploratory data analysis and data [0m
[33mmining, data cleaning, and preparation to evaluation of an ML model.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mTypes of data   [0m[1;33m213[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn four different data types, which are nominal, ordinal, [0m
[33minterval, and ratio data, and their examples, differences, and importance in ML.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m2[0m[33m. The Summary Statistics[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe mean        [0m[1;33m216[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what a mean is, why it is important, and how to calculate [0m
[33mone using the formula provided.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe median      [0m[1;33m163[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what median is and explore how and when to apply the [0m
[33mformula.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe mode        [0m[1;33m139[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, learn what mode is, and how and when to apply the [0m
[33mformula for the mode. Also, learn to apply the mean, the median, and the mode by coding examples [0m
[33min NumPy.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe percentile  [0m[1;33m168[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore what percentile is, how it differs from median, and when [0m
[33myou should use it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe percentage change   [0m[1;33m123[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn the concept of percentage change, how it works, and[0m
[33mwhen it should be used.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe range       [0m[1;33m153[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn this video, discover what range is and how it is different [0m
[33mfrom the mean, median, and mode.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe variance and the standard deviation [0m[1;33m246[0m[33m     [0m[33mThe variance and the standard deviation [0m
[33mquantify a data set's variety. Learn the difference between them and how to calculate them.  [0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe standard error of the mean vs. the standard deviation       [0m[1;33m158[0m[33m     [0m[33mDiscover what [0m
[33mstandard error is, when to use it, and when to use the standard deviation.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m3[0m[33m. From Quantiles to Correlation[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe quantiles and box plots     [0m[1;33m181[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what quantiles are by connecting them with [0m
[33mmedian and explore them on simple examples. Learn about the importance of box plots that show you[0m
[33ma visual summary of data.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mMissing data    [0m[1;33m214[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what missing data is, how to detect missing data, and most [0m
[33mimportantly how to handle it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe correlation [0m[1;33m148[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what is a correlation, when it should be used, and its [0m
[33mconnection to covariance.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe covariance  [0m[1;33m163[0m[33m     [0m[33mVariables are often related to one another. In ML, it is valuable[0m
[33mto be able to find those relations and measure their strength. Explore what a measurement called [0m
[33mcovariance is that helps you determine the strengths of these relationships.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe correlation coefficient     [0m[1;33m163[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what the Pearson correlation coefficient [0m
[33mis, what it indicates, and how to calculate it using a formula.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe correlation vs. causation   [0m[1;33m136[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn that a correlation between two or more [0m
[33mvariables doesn't necessarily mean that one causes the other.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m4[0m[33m. Random Variables and Probability Distribution[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIntroduction to probability distribution        [0m[1;33m135[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn what probability [0m
[33mdistribution is and its importance in ML. The primary reason for sampling from a probability [0m
[33mdistribution is to initialize the network before training.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe uniform distribution        [0m[1;33m139[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore the uniform distribution and learn about [0m
[33mits two key features.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe normal distribution [0m[1;33m180[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn one of the most frequently used distributions [0m
[33mcalled normal distribution as well as Gaussian distribution or the bell curve. Explore its [0m
[33mconnection with the mean and the standard deviation.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe Bernoulli distribution      [0m[1;33m126[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore the special case of binomial distribution[0m
[33mcalled Bernoulli distribution and how to calculate it.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mThe Multinoulli distribution    [0m[1;33m133[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn the case when you have training classifiers [0m
[33mwith more than two possible classes, you can use the Multinoulli distribution, which is a [0m
[33mgeneralization of the Bernoulli distribution.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m5[0m[33m. Sampling and Replacement[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSelection with replacement      [0m[1;33m144[0m[33m     [0m[33mIn ML, it is valuable to build a new dataset from[0m
[33mthe existing one by randomly selecting some of the elements of the existing set. Discover the [0m
[33mfirst algorithm for creating a list of selections, chosen from a starting pool of objects.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mSelection without replacement   [0m[1;33m139[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn the second algorithm for creating a list of[0m
[33mselections and explore and compare the implication of selection with replacement and selection [0m
[33mwithout replacement. [0m
[33m        [0m[33mBootstrapping   [0m[1;33m162[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore the application of two algorithms for creating that has [0m
[33mbeen covered in the previous two videos. It is useful when you want to calculate some statistics [0m
[33mabout a dataset that is too large for you to work with in practice.[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m6[0m[33m. Linear Regression[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIndependent and dependent variables     [0m[1;33m125[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn how to define independent and [0m
[33mdependent variables and understand the difference between them.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mLinear regression for continuous values [0m[1;33m153[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore the regression model, which is a [0m
[33mpowerful way of modeling the impact of one or more independent variables on the outcome.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mFitting a line  [0m[1;33m133[0m[33m     [0m[33mExplore an example of a linear regression model with real [0m
[33mnumbers.[0m
[33m        [0m[33mLinear least squares    [0m[1;33m183[0m[33m     [0m[33mLearn the least square method on the simple example.[0m
[33m## Conclusion[0m
[33m        [0m[33mNext steps      [0m[1;33m43[0m[33m      [0m[33mDiscover where to go from here.[0m

[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mtoc[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse[0m[1;33m>[0m

[33mProvide ONLY a bulleted list of essential prerequisite skills. Each prerequisite should be a [0m
[33mspecific, discrete skill [0m[1;33m([0m[33mor tool[0m[1;33m)[0m[33m that is absolutely necessary for the course.[0m

[1;32m──────────────────────────────────────────── [0mMessage[1;32m ────────────────────────────────────────────[0m
[1;36massistant:[0m
[34m• Proficiency in basic arithmetic and algebra [0m[1;34m([0m[34me.g., performing computations with averages, [0m
[34mvariances, and ratios[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m  [0m
[34m• Familiarity with basic probability concepts [0m[1;34m([0m[34mincluding understanding of distributions and [0m
[34msimple probability calculations[0m[1;34m)[0m[34m  [0m
[34m• Fundamental Python programming skills, with experience using NumPy for numerical and [0m
[34mstatistical computations[0m

[33mtracking UI system, and interact with registered models. Then, get an introduction to Hugging Face, starting with an [0m
[33moverview of the Hugging Face Hub, repositories, and Hugging Face Spaces. Learn how to collaborate and deploy models, [0m
[33mstore datasets and models, create live interactive demos, and leverage community repositories.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;&lt;P&gt;Note: [0m

[1;33m<[0m[1;33mcourse[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<course_title>[0m
[33mUsing Rust with Python[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mcourse_title[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<description>[0m
[33m&lt;p&gt;In this course, MLOps expert Noah Gift presents a practical guide on how to use Rust with Python. After a [0m
[33mshort introduction to Rust and Python, learn how to install PyO3 and use the basic Rust library. Find out how to go [0m
[33mfrom Rust to Python and explore the Rust ownership model. Examine a diagram of a PyO3 project and learn how to use the [0m
[33mPython calculator CLI, PyO3 features, and PyO3 exceptions. Go over how to call Python from Rust, run Python with [0m
[33membedded Rust, and embed a Rust CLI diagram, Rust CLI, or Rust CLI test. Explore several Rust-built Python tools, the [0m
[33mPolars CLI in Rust, and more. This course prepares you to integrate Rust with Python into your own [0m
[33mworkflows.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;&lt;p&gt;This course was created by Noah Gift. We are pleased to host this training in our [0m
[33mlibrary.&lt;[0m[33m/[0m[33mp[0m[33m&gt;[0m
[33m<[0m[33m/[0m[33mdescription[0m[33m>[0m
[33m<toc>[0m
[33m# Using Rust with Python[0m
[33m## [0m[1;33m1[0m[33m. Using Rust with Python[0m
[33m        [0m[33mIntroduction: Instructor        [0m[1;33m45[0m
